name: Ancient Power Released
text: This card is always treated as an "Omni" Spell. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation. You can fusion summon 1 "Dragoon" monster using materials from your hand and/or field. If you control a "Dragoon" monster or if you have a "Dragoon" monster in your GY, you can also banish monsters from your GY as fusion materials.
